document.full_text: former british prime minister gordon brown is to take an unpaid post as adviser to the world economic forum (wef), the swiss-based body which organizes the annual global leaders' meeting in davos said on friday.
document.title: former british pm brown takes unpaid davos job
lines_and_colors: former british prime minister gordon brown is to take an unpaid post as adviser to the world economic forum (wef), the swiss-based body which organizes the annual global leaders' meeting in davos said on friday.
